title: Simple Slow Cooker Pinto Beans and Ham

Ingredients.6: 1 teaspoon ham base (such as Better than Bouillon®)

Ingredients.7: 1 dash hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or to taste

Ingredients.8: 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Bring 8 cups water and pinto beans to a boil in a large pot. Remove pot from heat, cover, and let stand for 1 hour. Drain and rinse before using.

Directions.2: Transfer pinto beans to a slow cooker. Add ham bone, red onion, minced garlic, and ham base. Pour in remaining 6 cups of water, or enough to cover the beans.

Directions.3: Cool on Low until beans are tender, about 8 hours.

Directions.4: Remove the ham bone, shred meat, and add back to the beans. Discard the bone. Serve hot, seasoned with hot sauce, salt, and pepper.
